about_the_game:
Engage in intense warfare like never before in "War Sniper" the ultimate war game. Immerse yourself in the adrenaline-pumping action of a battlefield where snipers, tanks, and drones are your tools of destruction.

"War Sniper" is an exciting and realistic war combat game with a massive campaign mode that can be played offline and a real-time multiplayer PvP combat mode. Are you ready to take the shot and lead your squad to victory?

Key Features:
• Sniper Showdown: Become the deadliest sniper on the battlefield and eliminate enemy targets with precision. Take your shots from hidden vantage points and make each bullet count.

• Tank Warfare: Command powerful tanks and unleash devastation on the battlefield. Roll over enemy lines and dominate the warzone with heavy firepower.

• Powerful Drones: Pilot a variety of deadly drones, each equipped with a unique arsenal of weapons. Upgrade your drones for maximum devastation and precision shooting. Target enemies with pinpoint accuracy as you unleash a hail of bullets and missiles.

• Realistic Campaign Battlefields: Immerse yourself in stunning 3D environments that capture the chaos and intensity of modern warfare. From urban warfare to desert landscapes, each map presents unique challenges.

• Competitive PvP: Climb the ranks and prove your skills in intense PvP battles. Earn rewards and prestige as you become a renowned war hero.

• Rank Up: Climb the ranks and earn rewards as you prove your skills on the battlefield.

• Stunning Graphics: Experience the chaos of war with stunning visuals, realistic sound effects, and immersive gameplay.

• Prepare for war, commander! The battlefield is calling, and only the best snipers, tank commanders, and drone operators will emerge victorious. Download "War Sniper" and step into the heart of modern warfare today!

name: War Sniper

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1 or newer
  • Processor: Intel CPU Core 2 Duo (2.9 Ghz) or AMD Equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce 8500 GT
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or AMD Equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 960
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible

short_description: Engage in intense warfare like never before in "War Sniper" the ultimate war game. Immerse yourself in the adrenaline-pumping action of a battlefield where snipers, tanks, and drones are your tools of destruction.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Turkish
